comments: Nice and funny. She cares more about how you understand, use the language & how you are comfortable using it (how to write/speak/grammar/etc) than grades (but you shouldn\'t miss class bc German is hard!) She gives good feedback and really wants us to learn German! Very good! I Recommend!

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Susan is a great teacher. She really cares about each student individually and understands that everyone learns at a different rate. If you are wanting an easy A with no homework do not take this class. This class is for people who genuinely want to speak and learn the structure of German. It is important you participate and that you do you HW!

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: I believe Susan Stober to be the finest professor I have ever had the pleasure of learning from. She is very knowledgeable, professional and efficient. This was an accelerated course, yet she managed to offer every single student more than enough to succeed and be adequately equipped for courses to come. I highly, HIGHLY recommend her to anyone.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: I really liked having Susan as a teacher. She has a lot of energy in class and gets everyone engaged during class time! She places a lot of emphasis on participation so if you are looking to take a class and sit in the back and not talk / participate she isn\'t the right choice for you. If you want to be engaged in class then I highly recommend her.

comments: I enjoyed every day in this class. looking forward to advancing my skills in german. I am now taking german in maryland.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Susan is an amazing instructor. The only thing she gets on you for is participating (which isn\'t a lot to ask for in a college course). If you\'re serious about learning German, Stober\'s your teacher. Her technological skills kind of suck but she still communicates deadlines clearly- especially when it comes to exams.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Susan is a passive aggressive biased grader. Participation and attendance is more important than performance. The class itself is centered around speaking German not so much writing or reading. No tests, quizzes, or essays. Show up, participate, do your homework and you might get an A if she likes you.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: S. Stober is dogmatic in her teaching style. She is overly confident in her methods, insisting that it\'s the only way to learn. I don\'t need to use hand motions for every verb that I learn nor do I need to write out 100 vocab cards per chapter, it\'s unnecessary and time consuming. She speaks too much English for being immersion and grades harshly.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Wonderful teacher! If you are serious about learning german, or just want to do your language requirement, she will make it fun! She is very helpful if you are having problems. She wants everyone to understand and will try her hardest to help you no matter what.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Susan is an excellent teacher! She is wonderful at describing and acting things in german so you don\'t need english. She really pushes you and you will learn a lot if you do the homework and participate. I couldn\'t believe how quickly I learned! She is also very fair and doesn\'t hold everyone to the same standard, she knows if you are trying.

comments: Best language teacher ever. Though I didn\'t pass with flying colors, I really enjoyed her class. You can tell she loves the language! Easy homework, just don\'t miss class!

comments: Great teacher. Very Passionate. She can be a difficult teacher but that\'s only because she wants you to exceed.

comments: Susan was an excellent professor. Though her teaching wasn\'t 100% clear all of the time, but that\'s to be expected in an immersion course. The homework was fairly easy and I picked up a sizable amount of German at the end.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: I LOVE Susan! She is a fantastic teacher, she always finds a way to help you understand German IN German. She is very helpful, and not afraid to correct your pronunciation (which is awesome). I highly recommend taking German from her.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: I started the class not knowing a word of German and now I can have basic conversations and express myself. She wants you to succeed, participation is very important as there are no written tests. Expect to do skits. She is a little conservative and if you talk about anything with your classmates she doesn\'t find appropriate she will interrupt you.

tag_professor: Participation matters (5)  Tough Grader (3)  Respected (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Inspirational (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Susan definitely knows the language well. Participation is a very large part of the grade, but she\'s also very understanding. Homework is extremely easy and self-corrected. She\'s so kind, so sweet and extremely encouraging. She\'s a fantastic instructor.

comments: Very helpful teacher, speaks quick, so make sure you knuckleheads pay attention. Great attention to students and loves feedback. It would behoove you to remember to bring your book and buy a dictionary (Harper-Collins is a good one).

comments: Basis her class primarily on participation. It\'s ridiculous.

comments: Great teacher. She speaks to you like you are a kindergartner, which is helpful when learning a new language. If you dont understand something she will find a way to explain it so that you do, no matter how long it takes, and never in English.
